solution_line_template: There are {months_per_year}/{months_in_group} = <<{months_per_year}/{months_in_group}={four_month_groups_per_year}>>{four_month_groups_per_year} four month groups in a year
Jack drives {miles_per_four_months}*{four_month_groups_per_year} = <<{miles_per_four_months}*{four_month_groups_per_year}={miles_per_year}>>{miles_per_year} miles in a year.
Jack has driven {miles_per_year}*{years_driven} = <<{miles_per_year}*{years_driven}={total_miles_driven}>>{total_miles_driven} miles since he has started driving.
